article: More and more often we heard of people talking about Karaoke ( OK ) . But what on earth it is about , still remains a question for many people . Karaoke is a sort of acoustic equipment which was invented in Japan around the middle of the 1970 ' s . It means " a band without people " in Japanese . In fact , it is just a music tape without words . This equipment first appeared in some public houses and snack bars , and mainly for the customers to enjoy themselves . Most of the music in Karaoke was popular music . Therefore , at times , when anyone felt like it , he might sing songs to the accompaniment of the music that came from the equipment . Shortly after its invention , Karaoke was spread to the whole world . It was introduced to China and was welcomed by many people . Although you are not a good singer , or even sometimes you may sing out of tune , you can always enjoy yourself by singing Karaoke .
